raw_comment:
We've noticed the farther north you go, the later leaves begin to appear.

I wonder if they get sun down south sooner than the north.

What this graph shows the time of year each section of America starts to see it first leaves.
ace_sentences: If a place is farther north, then leaves begin to appear later in this place.
I wonder if places in the south get sun sooner than places in the north.
The graph shows the time of year.
Each section of America is a section.
For each section, the graph shows when this section first starts to see its first leaves.
